returns.success: true if the proof passes false otherwise

params.programVKey: The verification key for the RISC-V program.
params.proofBytes: The proof of the program execution the SP1 zkVM encoded as bytes.
params.publicValues: The public values encoded as bytes.

VERIFIER_HASH().notice: Returns the hash of the verifier.

Verify(bytes,uint256[]).notice: Verify a Plonk proof. Reverts if the proof or the public inputs are malformed.

hashPublicValues(bytes).notice: Hashes the public values to a field elements inside Bn254.

verifyProof(bytes32,bytes,bytes).notice: Verifies a proof with given public values and vkey.
